```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```

```{r}
url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"
drug_use_html = read_html(url)

drug_use_html
```

```{r}
major_use_df = 
  drug_use_html |>
  html_table() |>
  first() |>
  slice(-1)
```

```{r}
nyc_cost_df = 
  read_html("http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm") |>
html_table(header = TRUE) |>
  first()
```
